description: This is the main entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the App component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a new root for rendering React components, mounting into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A helper component that activates additional checks and warnings for its children.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React components into the root container.
